TACPLUS_TEST.desc: Tacplus global configuration in TACPLUS table.

TACPLUS_SERVER_INVALID_TIMEOUT_TEST.desc: Tacplus server configuration with invalid timeout value in TACPLUS_SERVER table.

TACPLUS_SERVER_INVALID_AUTH_TYPE_TEST.desc: Tacplus server configuration with invalid auth type in TACPLUS_SERVER table.

TACPLUS_SERVER_INVALID_VRF_TEST.desc: Tacplus server configuration with invalid VRF in TACPLUS_SERVER table.
